pros: great experience, great people, fun job
cons: wish i could be a nurse

job_title: Clinical Nurse II in La Plata, MD
pros: Great benefits, unionized (which offers a lot- more than most RN’s realize at this hospital), close knit staff, safe staffing ratios (and a union to defend those ratios), pension plus a 401k type of retirement plan, free parking, safe area, awesome commute, lots of support from other staff/lower level management, tuition reimbursement.
cons: Upper-level management is somewhat out of touch but if you have a good manager (like I do) they advocate for their nurses and are good go betweens, chronically short-staffed (probably endemic to all hospitals in the area). Not a lot of opportunity for upward mobility, there is a lot of opportunity for sideways mobility. Due to being a small hospital- no on site specialists- do have tele psych/neuro.

cons: Need to improve on communication among the entire staff. Need to increase the pay.
